00001 package se.kth.md.simulinkExchange.conversion.simulink.preprocessing;
00002 
00003 import java.util.ArrayList;
00004 import java.util.Collection;
00005 
00006 import Simulink.Inport;
00007 import Simulink.Line;
00008 import Simulink.Outport;
00009 import Simulink.Port;
00010 import Simulink.ProtoObject;
00011 import Simulink.System;
00012 import Simulink.SystemReference;
00013 
00019 public class LinesProcessor {
00020         
00021         System theSystem;
00022         
00023         public static Collection<? extends ProtoObject> doIt(System aSystem) {
00024                 
00025                 LinesProcessor lp = new LinesProcessor();
00026                 lp.theSystem = aSystem;
00027                 return lp.process();
00028         }
00029 
00030         private Collection<? extends ProtoObject> process() {
00031                 ArrayList<ProtoObject> list = new ArrayList<ProtoObject>();
00032                 for (Line aLine : theSystem.getLines()) {
00033                         process( aLine );
00034                         list.add( aLine );
00035                 }
00036                 return list;
00037         }
00038 
00039         private void process(Line aLine) {
00040                 String simuName = null;
00041                 simuName = processPort(aLine, aLine.getSource());
00042                 aLine.setSimuNameSrc(simuName);
00043                 simuName = processPort(aLine, aLine.getDestination());
00044                 aLine.setSimuNameDst(simuName);
00045         }
00046         
00047         
00048         private String processPort(Line aLine, Port port) {
00049                 String simuName = null;
00050                 System portParentSys = obtainPortParent( port );
00051                 if ( portBelongsToSubsystem(aLine, portParentSys) ) {
00052                         SystemReference block = findBlockNameWithinReferences( aLine, portParentSys );
00053                         simuName = block.getName() + '/' + findPosInBlock(block.getTarget(), port); 
00054                 } else {
00055                         simuName = port.getName() + "/1";  
00056                 }
00057                 return simuName;
00058         }
00059 
00060         private Integer findPosInBlock(System aSystem, Port port) {
00061                 int index = aSystem.getInports().indexOf(port);
00062                 if ( index == -1 ) {
00063                         index = aSystem.getOutports().indexOf(port);
00064                 }               
00065                 return index+1;
00066         }
00067 
00068         private System obtainPortParent(Port port) {
00069                 // Hack to circumvent EMF inheritance issue:
00070                 // getParent is defined for Inport and Outport, 
00071                 // but it cannot be called from Port.
00072                 System parent = null;
00073                 String type = port.eClass().getName();
00074                 if (type.equalsIgnoreCase("Inport")) {
00075                         parent = ((Inport)port).getParent();
00076                 } else {
00077                         parent = ((Outport)port).getParent();
00078                 }
00079                 return parent;
00080         }
00081 
00082         private SystemReference findBlockNameWithinReferences(Line aLine, System portParentSys) {
00083                 for (SystemReference sysRef : aLine.getParent().getChildren()) {
00084                         if ( sysRef.getTarget() == portParentSys ) {
00085                                 return sysRef; 
00086                                 }
00087                 }
00088                 return null;
00089         }
00090 
00091         private boolean portBelongsToSubsystem(Line aLine, System portParentSys) {
00092                 if ( aLine.getParent() == portParentSys ) { 
00093                         return false;}
00094                 else { 
00095                         return true; }
00096         }
00097 
00098 }
